a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of key dimensions of human development: a long
and healthy life, a good education, and a decent standard of living. Higher values indicate higher human

g.text: Democratic Republic of CongoDemocratic Republic of Congo

text.tspan: Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2021-22) (2022)
